author: Cathrin Schaer
title: Debate rages over legality of Israel's attack on Iran
description: Israel says it struck Iran in self-defense, fearing a nuclear threat. But international law covering self-defense by states is very strict — fueling heated debate about the legality of Israel's initial attack.
content:
When it comes to discussing whether Israel's initial attack on Iran was justified or not, the arguments on both sides are strident and emotional.
Israel broke international law by attacking another … [+7822 chars]
